solution_line_template: On Tuesday, {tuesday_taken} books were taken out {initial_books} - {tuesday_taken} = <<{initial_books}-{tuesday_taken}={after_tuesday}>>{after_tuesday} books
On Wednesday, {wednesday_returned} books were returned {after_tuesday} + {wednesday_returned} = <<{after_tuesday}+{wednesday_returned}={after_wednesday}>>{after_wednesday} books
On Thursday, {thursday_taken} books were borrowed {after_wednesday} - {thursday_taken} = {after_thursday} books
